text: Herbert Leonhardt (27 January 1925 - July 1986) was a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1986 deaths Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United Team of Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Herbert Leonhardt
